statements: DELETE FROM call_logs WHERE caller_id = 1234 AND receiver_id = 5678;
DELETE FROM call_logs WHERE call_type = 'incoming' AND call_duration > 10;
DELETE FROM call_logs WHERE caller_id = 123 AND call_type = 'incoming';
DELETE FROM call_logs WHERE receiver_id = 456 AND call_duration > 60;
DELETE FROM call_logs WHERE call_id = 123 AND call_duration > 60;
DELETE FROM suspicious_patterns WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%scam%';
DELETE FROM suspicious_patterns WHERE pattern_type = 'Scam' AND pattern_description LIKE '%financial fraud%';

DELETE FROM calls WHERE call_id = 101;
DELETE FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
